item.title: SingleCellTools
item.description: Selected tools for single-cell and spatial transcriptomics. scRNA-seq Zero-preserving imputation: ALRA spatial transcriptomics segmentation-free inference of cell types: SSAM & SSAM lite Integration of single cell data Benchmarking analysis Benchmarking spatial and single-cell transcriptomics integration methods for transcript distribution prediction and cell type deconvolution Selected tools PASTE: Alignment and integration of spatial transcriptomics data from multiple adjacent tissue slices (Python) GLUE: Multi-omics single-cell data integration and regulatory inference with graph-linked embedding (Python/R) CellTrek: Spatial charting of single-cell transcriptomes in tissues (R) Tangram: aligns sc/snRNA-seq data to patial data (Python) SPOTlight: integration of Spatial Transcriptomics with scRNA-seq data to infer the location of cell types and states (R) cell2location: Cell2location maps fine-grained cell types in spatial transcriptomics (Python) Single cell data interactive visualisation Comparison of visualization tools for single-cell RNAseq data Seurat interactive plotting (HoverLocator()) Other tools sceasy: easy conversion of different single-cell data formats (R)
